meanings: Noun 항공 마커, 마커 비컨(계기착륙 시스템(ILS) 구성요소의 하나로, 비행기의 위치를 알려주는 지상 비컨국, 비컨 전류의 수신장치는 marker beacon receiver(MBR)라 한다)

vlive.korean: 아주 그냥 마커가 닳도록 사인해보겠습니다. We will sign autographs until our pens dry out. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : [FM_1.24] 프로미스나인 (fromis_9) - 'LOVE BOMB' 활동기 Behind Part.1
vlive.english: We will sign autographs until our pens dry out.

vlive.korean: 이게 마커라는 거예요. - 마커라고 해보세요. This is called a marker. - Say a marker. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : WANNA.B - 워너비 '눈 가리고 아웅아웅'
vlive.english: This is called a marker. - Say a marker.

vlive.korean: 보드 마커? - 보드 마커라고 합시다. Board marker? - Let's say it's a board marker. 듣기 View video NCT의 night night! : NCT 마크와 함께하는 '동심 DREAM' 녹음 현장! (with Mark Tue. 21st Mar. at 8pm)
vlive.english: Board marker? - Let's say it's a board marker.

vlive.korean: 맞아요. 에스쁘아 틴트 마커 립 듀오 좋아요. 맞아. Right, Espoir Tint Marker Lip Duo is nice. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [콩슈니 Kongsueni SHOW] 샤넬 신제품 런칭행사 즐기기! Let's go to Chanel's launching PARTY Let's play in Hongdae
vlive.english: Right, Espoir Tint Marker Lip Duo is nice.

vlive.korean: 눈썹은 T 브랜드의 타투 마커 썼구요. I used a tattoo marker from T brand to draw my eyebrows. 듣기 View video V Beauty : 데이지 Lonely Yubin Makeup 원더걸스 유빈 메이크업
vlive.english: I used a tattoo marker from T brand to draw my eyebrows.

examples.korean: In the third floor supply cabinet where they keep the markers and all that. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 3층 비품 캐비닛에서 구했는데, 마커펜 등 없는 게 없어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In the third floor supply cabinet where they keep the markers and all that. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The biomarkers helped them see what stage the cancer cells were at. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 바이오 마커는 암세포가 어느 단계에 있는지 확인할 수 있게 한다. Neungyule
examples.english: The biomarkers helped them see what stage the cancer cells were at. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A biomarker is a molecule found in body fluids such as blood, or other tissue. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 바이오 마커란 피와 같은 체액이나 그 외 조직에서 발견되는 분자이다. Neungyule
examples.english: A biomarker is a molecule found in body fluids such as blood, or other tissue. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A group of researchers found a biomarker that could change how doctors treat cancer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 한 연구팀이 암 치료의 판도를 바꿀 바이오 마커를 발견해냈다. Neungyule
examples.english: A group of researchers found a biomarker that could change how doctors treat cancer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They found that both of these biomarkers showed different growth stages of cancer cells. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 여기서 연구진은 이 두 바이오 마커 모두, 각기 다른 암세포 발달(증식) 단계(과정)를 보인다는 것을 알아낼 수 있었다. Neungyule
examples.english: They found that both of these biomarkers showed different growth stages of cancer cells. Add to Wordbook
